page.title: 17A COSHESTON FAMILY SUNDAY
page.content: Sunday in Cosheston is different to the other days. The children do not have to go to school. people can lie in bed a little later. Some go to church at the village church but not as many go now as in the past. Some of the children go to Sunday School. Many people have a big Sunday dinner and afterwards they may just watch T.V or they might go for a walk along the coast path or visit the Sports Centre in Pembroke for a swim or a game of squash or tennis. In the summer, many families will go to one of the nearby beaches and spend the day there. They might go for a picnic in the country. In the evening, they would get ready for school or work the next day and the parents might go to the pub or watch T.V.
